reviews.text: We chose this hotel after reading the other reviews here on tripadvisor, and it didn't disappoint. Really lovely decor, charming exterior (perfect for photographs) and efficient and friendly staff. It's situated slap-bang in the centre of Baden-Baden, and was a great base for exploring the city. I would definitely return.
reviews.title: Ridiculously charming hotel, really wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived tired after a long but beautiful trip up the B500 through the Black Forest from Switzerland on our motorbike. We were able to bring the bike right to the hotel door for unloading even though the hotel is situated on a pedestrian area in the centre of town. Afterwards it was moved to a private parking area a few hundred metres from the hotel.
reviews.title: In the centre of everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The historic, characterful hotel is bang in the middle of shops and restaurants and just opposite a good beer kellar. The staff are freindly and helpful. One guy is a biker too.
reviews.title: Charming hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was comfortable and the bathroom, though small, was clean, modern, and had a very good shower. Even though it is in the centre of things the room was quiet.
reviews.title: Great stay in the old city center - very nice hotel with attention to detail

reviews.text: The breakfast was typically continental with everything you would normally expect.
reviews.title: Warm, cosy....conveniently loacted...loved everything about it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Exactly what you want: great location, good breakfast and a good value. Nothing fancy but spotlessly cleaned and has everything you need. Stayed here twice and would not hesitate to stay again.
reviews.title: Great location, consistent quality

reviews.text: I was so impressed by the hotel during my stay here last year that I was happy to return. Must say, they have been consistent and I strongly recommend this hotel to travellers to Baden Baden.
reviews.title: Glad I made it back for the second time!

reviews.text: Very nice hotel we really loved it. We booked 2 rooms, 1suite and 1 room for 2 people. The suite is just enormous, probably close to 55 m2 for a very reasonable price (we paid 200 euros). The double room we booked, while obviously smaller was very nice too and pretty large.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything in the room is pretty new and well decorated. In both room, we had a kitchen which is a feature quite rare in hotel and we really appreciated that as we had a small kid with us.
reviews.title: Was redirected to another hotel

reviews.text: The view is just amazing on the main Baden Baden street but no noise at all in the room. Bed is quite comfortable and noise isolation is also perfect.
reviews.title: A very pleasant stay

reviews.text: I really enjoyed staying in this hotel. Sparkling clean room at the back of the hotel, which I specifically requested as I wanted a quiet room. Fantastic location, nice breakfast and comfortable beds -- what more can you ask for? It's not a luxury hotel, but it was very very nice. I have been coming to Baden Baden for 5 years, and now this is one of my favourites. I asked for a quiter room in the back, and it was fine, but if you had to keep the window open, you would hear the heating. Apart from that, everything was great.
reviews.title: Really wonderful stay

reviews.text: We were lucky to find somewhere, well located and good value late on a wet afternoon. The tourist information bureau found this place for us. It was generally clean but unfortunately was let down by a dirty bathroom floor in one of the two rooms we had. It is quaint and in great location for Baden Baden centre only a short walk to spa. Parking was a problem as we had a campervan that wouldn't fit in height restricted car parks.
reviews.title: We were lucky to find somewhere, well...

reviews.text: Clean, nice, large rooms, unique and quirky, amazing location, great service from guy running the cafe/checking in out.
reviews.title: Lovely place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our favorite stop on in our 18 night European Christmas adventure.
reviews.title: Can't Believe this Isn't Ranked Higher

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is adorable and close to everything in town. there is a great Lowenbrau beer garden right across the street and the spas are just a 5 minute walk away. If yo're there durign Christmas season, the Christmas market is close too.
reviews.title: This is the part of our trip we always talk about.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and a great stay in the very traditional German hotel. The bed was very comfortable and the room was clean. Bad part of the room was that we could not turn down the heat so I had to have the windows open all night. Which was fine as I liked the cool mountain air. there is no free internet. you have to purchase it from the front desk via a tmobile hot spot.There was a parking lot( 5 minute walk away) for our car which was an added bonus. breakfast was good and included in the room. Very central and easy to walk all over the town. If you are looking for a good room that is a good value do not hesitate to stay here.
reviews.title: Great value, excellent location

reviews.text: Can't beat this delightful hotel for its location, right in the heart of Baden Baden and close to all shops,spa and good restaurants. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Great value for money. Clean and cosy makes it the perfect budget hotel in this delightful town.
reviews.title: Hotel Latern

reviews.text: We spent New Year's Eve in this precious hotel. The location is great just few steps from famous spa and in the core of the town. It is a great value for money hotel. It is clean and simple with a very nice warm atmospheare. Forget taxi, cars and bus because you can reach everything on foot. Would recommend it.
reviews.title: Warm atmospheare

reviews.text: Small, nice hotel in the pedestrian area. Rooms were nice and well equipped with sitting area, bathroom and even a fridge. Very kind and helpful staff. Easy to reach buses to different parts of the surroundings.
reviews.title: Charming hotel in a charming city

reviews.text: The hotel has an old-world charm with little things reminding of the times gone. It is prettily decorated and the different way the rooms are placed add to the "cute" factor. A very friendly staff and a good restaurant makes it a perfect place to stay while visiting the city. The hotel is located in a little "pedestrian-only" square making it more attractive if you are visiting the city for a vacation and want to relax.
reviews.title: A pleasant place to stay
